mapper.select: select userId, businessId, remainder, totality, remark from t_account_info where userId = #{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(id) from t_account_info where 1=1
and userId=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_account_info (userId, businessId, remainder, totality, remark) values (#{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remainder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totality,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_account_info
userId,
businessId,
remainder,
totality,
remark,
